alert.note: Alert for Las Animas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued July 13 at 9:26PM MDT until July 13 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Tornado Warning for... South central Las Animas County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 1000 PM MDT. * At 926 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Trinchera, or 22 miles northeast of Raton, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and tennis ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Trinchera around 935 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this tornadic thunderstorm include Branson. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
